DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective review evaluate efficacy Valcyte ( valganciclovir ) prevent Cytomegalovirus ( CMV ) disease D+/R- liver transplant recipient . Data eligible patient collect 6 month follow transplantation .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Valcyte ( Valganciclovir ) D+/R- Liver Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Liver transplant recipient , > /= 16 year age Transplantation January 2004 June 2009 CMV seronegative recipient ( R ) receive liver transplant seropositive donor ( D+ ) Valganciclovir therapy least 70 day begin within 10 day post transplantation Assessment CMV disease status within first 6 month post transplantation
